Package de.arnomann.martin.jta.api.entities

Interface Chat

  • public interface Chat
    Represents the chat of a Channel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clear()
      Clears the chat.
      void connect​(boolean console)
      Connects to the chat using the default OAuth token (set using JTABot.setChatOAuthToken(String)).
      void connect​(java.lang.String oauth, boolean console)
      Connects to the chat.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the chat.
      Channel getChannel()
      Returns the chat's channel.
      void sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a message to the chat.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect​(java.lang.String oauth,
             boolean console)
      throws java.io.IOException,
             org.jibble.pircbot.IrcException
        Connects to the chat.
        Parameters:
        oauth - The OAuth token, you can get one at https://twitchapps.com/tmi/
        console - Whether there should be console output or not. Should be deactivated in big chats.
        Throws:
        org.jibble.pircbot.IrcException - If the connection failed.
        java.io.IOException - If the bot is already connected.

      • connect

        void connect​(boolean console)
      throws java.io.IOException,
             org.jibble.pircbot.IrcException
        Connects to the chat using the default OAuth token (set using JTABot.setChatOAuthToken(String)).
        Parameters:
        console - Whether there should be console output or not. Should be deactivated in big chats.
        Throws:
        org.jibble.pircbot.IrcException - If the connection failed.
        java.io.IOException - If the bot is already connected.
        See Also:
        connect(String, boolean)

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a message to the chat.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Disconnects from the chat.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the sleep was interrupted.

      • getChannel

        Channel getChannel()
        Returns the chat's channel.
        Returns:
        the channel.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the chat.
